Name: ReBoot
About the game: The game combines modern 3D-graphics and old school gameplay.Forget about peaceful aiming and a sense of superiority over your enemies. Dynamism Test your reaction by dodging enemy shots. Learn to find a safe way under enemies' heavy fire. Tactics Choose the most dangerous enemies and kill them first! Learn all of your opponentâ€™s tricks. Use short time to rest in order to prepare your weapons for battle. Try to stay in that area, where it will be easier for you to protect yourself. Evolution Evolve into a more advanced mechanism. Your character is too weak to beat all the enemies without training. Gain points, level-up your character, give him new abilities.
